ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Having problems with 39 charm song
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yes, charmed mobs have in my experience not been altogether responsive to successive rapid commands, have it back of, wait a sec and start mashing the
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yes, charmed mobs have in my experience not been altogether responsive to
successive rapid commands, have it back of, wait a sec and start mashing the
attack key until it finally does what you say.

-Faras

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n) [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Monday, November 06, 2000 3:11 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Having problems with 39 charm song


I have a different hotkey for /pet back off and /pet attack. I have been
giving the /pet attack immediately after giving /pet back off. Perhaps I
should pause a second or so next time to see if that is the problem.

Galtin of E'ci
